identificationModule.briefTitle: An Exploratory, Open-Label, Oligo-Center Study to Evaluate the Safety, Efficacy, and Pharmacokinetics of Intravenous DNV3837 in Subjects With Clostridium Difficile Infection
identificationModule.officialTitle: An Exploratory, Open-Label, Oligo-Center Study to Evaluate the Safety, Efficacy, and Pharmacokinetics of Intravenous DNV3837 in Subjects With Clostridium Difficile Infection

armGroups.label: Part 1
armGroups.description: 10 subjects of either sex with severe or non-severe CDI will be enrolled to receive DNV3837. Treatment infusions will be administered at a constant rate resulting in a total IV infusion duration of 6 hours per day, for a total daily dose of 1.5 mg/kg actual body weight(BW)/day DNV3837. Infusions will be administered once daily for 10 consecutive days.

armGroups.label: Part 2
armGroups.description: 30 subjects with severe or non-severe CDI will be enrolled to receive DNV3837. Treatment infusions will be administered at a constant rate resulting in a total IV infusion duration of 6 hours per day, for a total daily dose of 1.5 mg/kg actual body weight(BW)/day DNV3837. Infusions will be administered once daily for 10 consecutive days

interventions.name: DNV3837
interventions.description: Treatment infusions will be administered at a constant rate resulting in a total IV infusion duration of 6 hours per day, for a total maximum daily dose of 120 mg DNV3837. Infusions will be administered once daily for 10 consecutive days.

primaryOutcomes.measure: Treatment Success at Test of Cure
Incidence of relapse at Test of Cure
Treatment failure at Test of Cure

locations.facility: University of California (UC) Davis Medical Center
DiGiovanna Institute for Medical Education and Research
The Medical Arts Health Research Group - Kelowna
